name: Monopoly Collection
overview: Play the classic board game you know and love in two exciting ways, with MONOPOLY and MONOPOLY Streets! • Play in ―Stratosphere City an original futuristic world never before seen on Wii. • Experience the same set-up used at the MONOPOLY World Championships with the ―World Championship Board • All-new game tokens and characters • Play as MR. and MRS. POTATO HEAD • Play with preset or custom game rules – Choose the rules that best suit your style of play. • Original MONOPOLY— Enjoy the classic game you know and love in an all-new way! Features smooth graphics, expressive animations, and ten stylized game boards with themes such as jungle, arctic, and future. • MONOPOLY Streets—MONOPOLY Streets has everything you love about the board game, presented as a street level tour of Mr. Monopoly’s fully animated world.
